title: Can't queue in anything except aram and blindpick
body: I have been level 30 for well over a season and was recently placed in s1 after ranked placements. However, I was recently put in low priority queue because of the client bug that doesn't connect you to games. Now that I have finished my low priority I can't queue in solo/duo, normal draft, or flex. I can play if a friend invites me though, is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
We've seen this pop up when there are corrupt or missing files in your League directory. If you run a quick repair, it should resolve this. Hit the cog button at the top-right of the client, then hit the *Initiate Full Repair* button. Don't forget to close League out and relog to ensure it went through.

Let me know if this worked!
